data.message: I am very upset that all it takes is one tap for us to like something or "interested" in an event. I accidently clicked interested while scrolling down a page on the phone and now it will show up that i was interested in an event. Please put verification for facebook mobile on interested becsause it is bringing shame to me when I am using Facebook.  Otherwise I enjoy facebook a lot.Thank you very much.

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Arthur. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone. Please share your suggestions with us here: on.fb.me/1N2bhYs. -James
